body.p: The Trustees shall appoint one of the full-time or part-time members as the Chair of the ISSB. Up to two of the full-time members of the ISSB may also be designated by the Trustees as a Vice-Chair, whose role shall be to chair meetings of the ISSB in the absence of the Chair or to represent the Chair in external contacts. The appointment of the Chair and the designation as Vice-Chair shall be for such term as the Trustees decide. The title of Vice-Chair does not imply that the member concerned is the Chair elect. The appointment of a Chair and Vice-Chair(s) should be made with regard to maintaining a geographical balance.
